channel.title: Comments on: The Endgame is a Goldmine

item.title: By: Thanos Severius
item.dc:creator: Thanos Severius
item.description: Great post, the hardest part if you are in group one or two is alt-tabbing out to trim the screenies to fit your blog's headers...
item.content:encoded: Great post, the hardest part if you are in group one or two is alt-tabbing out to trim the screenies to fit your blog’s headers…

item.title: By: Captain Slack
item.dc:creator: Captain Slack
item.description: Jesus swept. I think having somebody pull a Leeroy would <em>increase</em> the average planning skills on display.
item.content:encoded: Jesus swept. I think having somebody pull a Leeroy would increase the average planning skills on display.

item.title: By: Elemanzer
item.dc:creator: Elemanzer
item.description: You can't forget about the lava pally asking for a rez and summons 2 secs after he dies while everyone is fighting.
item.content:encoded: You can’t forget about the lava pally asking for a rez and summons 2 secs after he dies while everyone is fighting.

item.title: By: bump
item.dc:creator: bump
item.description: What, no mention of someone asking for a repair bot after the first wipe?
item.content:encoded: What, no mention of someone asking for a repair bot after the first wipe?

item.title: By: drypulse
item.dc:creator: drypulse
item.description: hehe man i never thought of harrassing my wc users like that.... finally something to do while all the mages pad their dmg on the ae's.... damn ae's
item.content:encoded: hehe man i never thought of harrassing my wc users like that…. finally something to do while all the mages pad their dmg on the ae’s…. damn ae’s

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
I will say this much for Whispercast ... it is a great tool for griefing fellow guildmates during a long-ass raid.
/tell paladin salvation is the way to god! Paladin tells you: Salvation has been queued for you! /tell paladin salvation for me? Aww, you shouldn't have! Paladin tells you: Salvation has been queued for you! Paladin tells you: dude, stop that. /tell druid wild and crazy is how I like my druids! Druid tells you: Mark of the Wild has been queued for you! Druid tells you: huh? /tell mage Intel is the primary stat for casters, right? Mage tells you: Arcane Intellect has been queued for you! Mage tells you: umm, why am I casting intel on a rogue? /tell mage no idea.
item.content:encoded:
I will say this much for Whispercast … it is a great tool for griefing fellow guildmates during a long-ass raid.

/tell paladin salvation is the way to god!
Paladin tells you: Salvation has been queued for you!
/tell paladin salvation for me? Aww, you shouldn’t have!
Paladin tells you: Salvation has been queued for you!
Paladin tells you: dude, stop that.
/tell druid wild and crazy is how I like my druids!
Druid tells you: Mark of the Wild has been queued for you!
Druid tells you: huh?
/tell mage Intel is the primary stat for casters, right?
Mage tells you: Arcane Intellect has been queued for you!
Mage tells you: umm, why am I casting intel on a rogue?
/tell mage no idea.
